HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Versatile ship presets. The following presets are included: * ship reactor only * ship minimum (1 cryptosleep casket) * ship for map colonists (X cryptosleep caskets) * ship for all colonists (Y cryptosleep caskets) Deep-count ingredients. A readout of not only the main resources you still need, but the recipe ingredients to make them. Custom goals. Currently only possible through save-game editing, find the ResourceGoalTracker section, delete , and adjust the parts to whatever you desire. (With usePreset the goal section isn't read, it's merely for example.) Select recipe per resource. By default, the first found recipe is used (and vanilla only has 1 per resource). With mods, you may like to select which recipe ingredients you'd like counted. Currently only possible through save-game editing, find the ResourceGoalTracker section, and edit as desired. (Blank the value to remove, i.e.
  • though this will produce a harmless error.) Count inside relevant building frames. If the construction is a part of your goal, its resources are still counted, but if not they will be needed again. Performance. Only updates as often as ordinary resource counter. Mod compatibility. All ship presets are generated from ShipUtility.RequiredParts(), and will work fine if modified. Recipes to deep-count ingredient are found automatically, and changeable. Custom goals are also possible.
